FILE: cm630740v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAN - JAPAN
RIVALRY: RIV1201
DISPUTE(S): MID3512 
RIVALRY: RIV1202
DISPUTE(S): MID2793 MID2751 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190220
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190220

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWII MIDs: MID3512

MID2793

TERRMID: MID2793 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2793 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2793 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iran attacked four Japanese ships during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq to harm Iraq's economy during the war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a terriorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2793 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2793 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2793 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2793 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2793 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2793 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2793 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2751

TERRMID: MID2751 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2751 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2751 from Gibler 2018, in 1988 Iran attacked a Japanese ship during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq to harm Iraq's economy during the war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a terriorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2751 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2751 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2751 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2751 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2751 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2751 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2751 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
